words.source: Hi, my name is Ganis
words.target: Olá, o meu nome é Ganis

words.source: I'm married and I have a daughter
words.target: Sou casado e tenho uma filha

words.source: I'm from Indonesia
words.target: Sou da Indonésia

words.source: I'm learning Portuguese because I like Portugal
words.target: Estou a aprender português porque gosto de Portugal

words.source: I want to go to Portugal someday
words.target: Quero ir a Portugal um dia

words.source: Good luck with your trip to Indonesia
words.target: Boa sorte com a tua viagem à Indonésia

words.source: Sleep well, my little bear
words.target: Dorme bem, meu ursinho

words.source: I love you, my darling
words.target: Amo-te, meu amor

words.source: Study well at school and listen to your teachers
words.target: Estuda bem na escola e ouve os teus professores

words.source: Don't cry, my daughter
words.target: Não chores, minha filha

words.source: Father will always protect you
words.target: O pai vai sempre proteger-te

words.source: Be nice to your mother
words.target: Sê simpático para a tua mãe

words.source: My wife is very beautiful
words.target: A minha esposa é muito bonita

words.source: I love her so much
words.target: Amo-a muito

words.source: She takes care of our family
words.target: Ela cuida da nossa família

words.source: She likes to write stories
words.target: Ela gosta de escrever histórias

words.source: My wife loves to read novels
words.target: A minha esposa adora ler romances

words.source: We met in South Korea
words.target: Conhecemo-nos na Coreia do Sul

words.source: I'm working in my home office
words.target: Estou a trabalhar no meu escritório em casa

words.source: I'm going to the gym to exercise
words.target: Vou ao ginásio para fazer exercício

words.source: I'm having dinner with my family
words.target: Estou a jantar com a minha família

words.source: I'm watching TV in the living room
words.target: Estou a ver televisão na sala de estar

words.source: My daughter is playing with me
words.target: A minha filha está a brincar comigo

words.source: My wife is cooking in the kitchen
words.target: A minha esposa está a cozinhar na cozinha
